titleStmt.title: Die Sabbathi, 26 Augusti, 1643. Whereas divers persons have beene assessed upon the Ordinances of Parliament, for the twentieth part, and weekely assessement, subsidies, and other payments; ...

publicationStmt.publisher: August 28. London Printed for John VVright, in the Old-bailey,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
An Order of Parliament respecting those who refuse to pay the weekly assessment.
Order to print dated: Die Sabbathi, 26 Augusti, 1643; and signed: Joh. Browne Cler. Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
